mapper.select: SELECT memberId, name, phone, birthDate, gender, status, memo, created_at AS createdAt FROM member ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, phone, birthDate, gender, status, memo, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{status}, #{memo}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birthDate = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, status = #{status}, memo = #{memo} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
